tool.name: OGS: OGS2VTK
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'OGS2VTK'.

param.name: mesh_input_file
param.label: mesh input file
param.help: the file containing the input mesh

param.name: mesh_output_file
param.label: mesh output file
param.help: the file the mesh will be written to

param.name: ascii_output
param.label: ascii output
param.help: Write VTU output in ASCII format. Due to possible rounding the ascii output could result in lower accuracy.

tool.help: This tool runs the **OGS2VTK** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
